name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This introductory course provides an overview of the history, principles, and practices of journalism. It covers topics such as media ethics, newsgathering, storytelling, audience engagement, and media law.

name: Multimedia Reporting
description: This course focuses on the use of multimedia tools and techniques to create effective journalistic storytelling. It covers topics such as video and audio editing, photography, graphics, animation, and interactive media.

name: Visual Storytelling
description: This advanced course covers the principles and practices of visual storytelling for multimedia journalism. It covers topics such as video production, photography, graphics, animation, and interactive media.

name: Interactive Journalism
description: This advanced course provides an overview of the principles and practices of interactive journalism. It covers topics such as data journalism, online storytelling, and web-based media.
